fixed_skill.desc: Deal Curse damage to all foes equal to 104.0%/109.2%/114.4% of Attack. Also, decrease Defense by 10.0%/10.5%/11.0% and increase continous damage taken by 20.0%/21.0%/22.0%.
fixed_skill.name: Disaster Ward

innate_skill.desc: Deal Curse damage to 1 foe equal to 132.5/140.8/149.1% of Attack. Inflict 1 to 2 Curse stacks on the foe.
innate_skill.name: Eigaon

innate_skill.desc: Deal Curse damage to all foes equal to 66.5/70.7/74.9% of Attack. Chance to inflict 1 Curse stack on foes.
innate_skill.name: Maeigaon

passive_skill.desc:
Increase Attack by 29.1%.
When using a skill on a foe, inflict Festival of Destruction for 2 turns. The first time that foes inflicted with Festival of Destruction take Fire damage, inflict Fearsome Flames: For 2 turns, increase damage taken by 8%, and 50% chance to inflict Burn.
passive_skill.name: Year-End Harbinger

passive_skill.desc:
Increase Attack by 29.1%.
When using a skill on a foe, inflict Festival of Destruction for 2 turns. The first time that foes inflicted with Festival of Destruction take Fire damage, inflict Fearsome Flames: For 3 turns, increase damage taken by 8%, and 50% chance to inflict Burn.
passive_skill.name: Year-End Harbinger I

passive_skill.desc:
Increase Attack by 29.1%.
When using a skill on a foe, inflict Festival of Destruction for 2 turns. The first time that foes inflicted with Festival of Destruction take Fire damage, inflict Fearsome Flames: For 3 turns, increase damage taken by 8%, and 75% chance to inflict Burn.
passive_skill.name: Year-End Harbinger II

passive_skill.desc:
Increase Attack by 29.1%.
When using a skill on a foe, inflict Festival of Destruction for 2 turns. The first time that foes inflicted with Festival of Destruction take Fire damage, inflict Fearsome Flames: For 3 turns, increase damage taken by 12%, and 75% chance to inflict Burn.
passive_skill.name: Year-End Harbinger III

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Curse damage to all foes equal to 90.0%/96.3%/102.6% of Attack. Increase damage taken by 19.6%/21.0%/22.3% for 2 turns.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
